descriptionHtml:
This mod adds [color=#00ff00][b]CHIMERAS*[/b][/color] in Skyrim (DLCs Dawnguard/Dragonborn required)

[color=#00ff00][b]*[/b][/color][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chimera_(mythology)] Chimeras in Wikipedia [/url]

[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Fr.[/color]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]mMT5U-cmmGk[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-


[color=#00ff00][b]COCKATRICE[/b][/color]


[color=#ff0000][b]RIDEABLE COCKATRICE[/b][/color]

To have the Summonable Cockatrice you must buy the “Spell tome: Conjure Cockatrice” at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace in Solitude).

With the book you have the spell....Then summon the Cockatrice...

(If you have not bought a book/spell, NO PROBLEM, you can always put again this mod at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game… buy the books, etc..)

The Cockatrice will appear above you...

[color=#ff0000]Controls [/color]

You can head in any direction (turn left or right, up and down) with the [color=#00ff00]Mouse[/color] (Look up and look down to steer up and down)

and

[color=#00ff00] W[/color] (or Z): [color=#ff0000]forward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] A[/color] (or Q): [color=#ff0000]turn left[/color]

[color=#00ff00] D[/color]: [color=#ff0000]turn right[/color]


You can summon your Cockatrice again when you have received the message "Dragon has returned".
(The Cockatrice will not disappear unless you mount it ride it and dismount it)

The Cockatrice do not help the player in combat and is supposed to be used as transport only

This mount contains a lot of bugs or problems (The legs tremble when you go up in altitude; You can be stuck on a tree) Save before taking a ride

[i]“Whenever I fly, the camera constantly clips in and out of the dragon model”

Only to go up in altitude

You can also try the mouse scroll wheel, to zoom back[/i]

Sometimes you have to be patient to mount on the Cockatrice (If you are unable to ride the Cockatrice, you must go away from him and then return to him)

To dismount, you must land, and you have to wait to be well “IN” the ground, then "E"...

If your Cockatrice refuses to fly again (to return at "home" !) when landing you can try a FAST TRAVEL

[img]https://i.imgur.com/CCvukSc.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b]ARMY OF COCKATRICES[/b][/color]

This mod adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs with the fire of the forge, and quickly create a horde of Cockatrices (5, 15, 50, MORE ? ...[color=#ff0000]ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer ![/color])

To obtain these eggs, simply bring the “Cockatrice Egg” found with some merchants in [color=#00ff00]WHITERUN[/color] ([b][i]Merchants: Arcadia of Arcadia’s Cauldron, Anoriath, Hulda of the Bannered Mare[/i][/b]) to a forge and create the "Incubated Cockatrice Egg" in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into Cockatrices

When your creatures die, remember to loot their corpses for more eggs

If you have my other mods with Incubated Eggs: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55592/?]Incubated Eggs[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76666/?]Curious Birds Mounts and Armies [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76681/?]Chimeras Mounts and Armies[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76864/?]New Gryphons Mounts and Armies[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76818/?]Snails and Slugs of Skyrim[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77311/?]Repopulate with Mushrooms[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73785/?]Griffins Mounts and Armies[/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68187/?]Gerbils Mounts and Followers [/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68832/?] Skaven Mounts and Followers [/url]or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55520/?] Incubated Winged Chocobos [/url], in order to find these eggs at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game.

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=484628Cockatricemountarmy1.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/484628Cockatricemountarmy1.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=954782chimerasmountsarmies.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/954782chimerasmountsarmies.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#00ff00][b]CATS[/b][/color]

You can summon 4 new "Cats": the Chimera, The Manticore and the Echateres (2)

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=180706Farengar20.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/180706Farengar20.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/color]

1) You must place this .esp at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game to obtain the 6 books (Normally this is done automatically)

You can find the “Spell tome XXXX",at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach (Whitherun) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace in Solitude)

If you have not bought the book/spell, NO PROBLEM, you can always put again this mod at the bottom of the list… buy the book, etc

2) If you have my other mods with incubated eggs:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55592/?] Incubated Eggs [/url] ,[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68187/?]Gerbils Mounts and Followers [/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68832/?] Skaven Mounts and Followers [/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55520/?] Incubated Winged Chocobos [/url], in order to find these eggs at merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game

3) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=255553steam2.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/255553steam2.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b]CREDITS[/b][/color]

Thanks to SpikeDragonLord and jboyd4 for the Cockatrice, the Chimera, The Manticore and the Echateres in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76203/?] Beasts of Tamriel [/url] (Thanks also to Dogtown1)
